short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A universal 'click to view recipe' button. When the icon lights up, click to display the entire recipe in an easy to read format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Funky Radish - Recipe Collector adds a universal 'click to view recipe' button to your browser. 

You ever land on a food blog and just wanna skip straight to the recipe? 

Problem solved! Install and pin the Funky Radish extension to your menu bar. 

When FunkyRadish detects a recipe, you'll see the icon change colors. This signals that a recipe has been detected. Click the icon to see the recipe appear instantly in an easily readable format. 

But that's not all. Additional features make this the most powerful professional recipe app out there.

If you create an account at FunkyRadish.com, it's incredibly quick and easy to save any recipe you find online straight to your recipe book. 

Once you save a recipe, it's available in your account through the FunkyRadish app on either Android or IOS, or on the website at FunkyRadish.com. Whatever recipe you used most recently, it'll be right at the top of the app when you're logged in. On the mobile apps, the screen stays opened while you cook. 

Basically, you've found the best recipe app in the world, and it's currently free, so at least give it a shot. And let me know if it's not awesome. I built it.
